name: vs-average
description: Averages multiple clips together. The general idea is to be able to take multiple sources of the same video, and average them together, to negate effects of lossy compression. Can also be effective for temporal blurring.

functions.name: Mean
functions.description: Mean will set the output pixel to the average (or mean) of the input pixels from each clip.

functions.name: Median
functions.description: Median will set the output pixel to the Median (middle value of the sorted data) of the input pixels from each clip.
